songs.title: Save Your Tears (Remix)
songs.description: The Weeknd and Ariana Grande team up for the remix its a nostalgic and upbeat 80s pop-inspired track.

songs.title: Lost Cause
songs.description: Billie Eilish's latest single 'Lost Cause' is a laid-back, catchy pop tune .

songs.title: Good as Hell
songs.description: A pop and R&B song about self-love and empowerment

songs.title: Smoking out of the window
songs.description: A soul and R&B ballad about seduction and romance

songs.title: Clash (feat. Stormzy)
songs.description: A rap song about the ups and downs of success

songs.title: Confetti (feat. Saweetie)
songs.description: A dance-pop song about having fun and feeling confident

songs.title: SummerYoMuthi
songs.description: A pop and afrobeat song about having fun and living in the moment

songs.title: SMA (Send Me Away)
songs.description: SMA is a song by South African rapper Nasty C featuring Rowlene. It was released in 2019 as part of Nasty C's album titled 'Strings and Bling'.

songs.title: good 4 u
songs.description: Olivia Rodrigo's latest single 'good 4 u' is a high-energy pop punk anthem.

songs.title: Kiss Me More
songs.description: Doja Cat's latest single 'Kiss Me More' is a funky, upbeat track featuring SZA.
